message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can go as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $155?
I'm really interested in the product, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $145?
